wikipedia.title: Friedrich Nietzsche
wikipedia.summary: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche ( ; 15 October 1844 – 25 August 1900) was a German philosopher, cultural critic, poet, philologist, and Latin and Greek scholar whose work has exerted a profound influence on Western philosophy and modern intellectual histo
